channel.title: [PI] Problems - Assistance needed ASAP
channel.description: Well, basically these problems are ruining my server and I need fixes. 1st problem - Whenever someone clicks on the spellbook when using lunar, their client will freeze. 2nd problem - When using mage, the player will move to the NPC/Player they are maging. Anyone know how to fix these? I need help quite badly

item.title: [PI] Problems - Assistance needed ASAP
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

1; The server is trying to load an invalid interface for the Lunar book.
2; That’s a bug in the Magic-following, to make the player follow players/npcs whilst using magic on them. You’ll have to rewrite it yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Problems - Assistance needed ASAP
item.dc:creator: @getstabbed getstabbed
item.description:
@getstabbed wrote:

Well, basically these problems are ruining my server and I need fixes.
1st problem - Whenever someone clicks on the spellbook when using lunar, their client will freeze.
2nd problem - When using mage, the player will move to the NPC/Player they are maging.
Anyone know how to fix these? I need help quite badly

Read full topic
